flavorText: Those who forget their past are doomed to be eaten by it.

foreignData.flavorText: Wer seine Vergangenheit vergisst, läuft Gefahr, von ihr gefressen zu werden.
foreignData.name: Vorteil der Raubtiere
foreignData.text: Bringe am Ende des Zuges jedes Gegners einen 2/2 grünen Eidechsen-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel, falls dieser Spieler in diesem Zug keinen Kreaturenzauber gespielt hat.

foreignData.flavorText: Aquellos que olvidan el pasado están condenados a ser comidos por él.
foreignData.name: Ventaja depredadora
foreignData.text: Al final del turno de cada oponente, si ese jugador no jugó un hechizo de criatura este turno, pon en juego una ficha de criatura Lagarto verde 2/2.

foreignData.flavorText: Ceux qui oublient leur passé sont condamnés à être dévorés par lui.
foreignData.name: Avantage prédatoire
foreignData.text: À la fin du tour de chaque adversaire, si ce joueur n'a pas joué de sort de créature ce tour-ci, mettez en jeu un jeton de créature 2/2 verte Lézard.

foreignData.flavorText: Coloro che dimenticano il loro passato sono condannati a farsi divorare da esso.
foreignData.name: Vantaggio Predatorio
foreignData.text: Alla fine del turno di ogni avversario, se quel giocatore non ha giocato una magia creatura in quel turno, metti in gioco una pedina Lucertola 2/2 verde.

foreignData.flavorText: 過去を忘れた者はそれに食われる宿命にある。
foreignData.name: 捕食者の優位
foreignData.text: 各対戦相手のターン終了時に、そのプレイヤーがこのターンにクリーチャー呪文をプレイしていなかった場合、緑の２/２のトカゲ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体場に出す。

foreignData.flavorText: Aqueles que esquecem seu passado estão condenados a ser devorados por ele.
foreignData.name: Vantagem Predatória
foreignData.text: No final do turno de cada oponente, se aquele jogador não tiver jogado nenhuma mágica de criatura no turno, coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura verde 2/2 do tipo Lagarto.

foreignData.flavorText: Те, кто забывает о своем прошлом, обречены стать его ужином.
foreignData.name: Хищническое Преимущество
foreignData.text: В конце хода каждого оппонента, если тот игрок не разыгрывал в этом ходу заклинание существа, положите в игру одну фишку существа 2/2 зеленый Ящер.

foreignData.flavorText: 忘记过往的人注定要被它吃掉。
foreignData.name: 掠夺优势
foreignData.text: 在每个对手的回合结束时，如果该牌手本回合未使用生物咒语，则你将一个2/2绿色蜥蜴衍生物放置进场。

name: Predatory Advantage
originalText: At the end of each opponent's turn, if that player didn't play a creature spell this turn, put a 2/2 green Lizard creature token into play.

rulings.text: Predatory Advantage’s ability has an “intervening ‘if’ clause.” That means (1) the ability won’t trigger at all unless the opponent whose turn it is didn’t cast a creature spell that turn, and (2) the ability will do nothing unless the opponent whose turn it is still hasn’t cast a creature spell by the time it resolves.

Predatory Advantage checks whether a player cast a creature spell, not whether a creature entered the battlefield under that player’s control. If that player cast a creature spell but you countered it, for example, you won’t get a Lizard token that turn.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, Predatory Advantage’s ability triggers twice at the end of the opposing team’s turn: once for each player. If neither of those players cast a creature spell that turn, you’ll get two Lizards. If one of those players cast a creature spell but the other didn’t, you’ll get one Lizard.

text: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player didn't cast a creature spell this turn, create a 2/2 green Lizard creature token.
